name: VR Jurassic - Dino Park World
description:
Have you ever wanted to meet dinosaurs in real life? Now you can be closer than ever!
The Jurassic era in Virtual Reality!
Three different modes give you guarantee of ultimate experience.
- Park
- Movie
- Roller Coasters (19)

They give you the opportunity to spend a lot of time in this Jurassic production.
All modes can be played in 3D and Virtual Reality mode.
Park mode allows you to explore Jurassic dino Zoo. No limitation, you decide where you want to walk and what kind of dinosaur to meet. The dream comes true. You can stay beside one of the biggest dinosaurs closer than ever!
In Movie mode, you found Episode 1 of the island history. Somethings goes wrong. Go and find what happened.
Virtual Reality game also brings to you different types of Roller Coasters for now...
Check out StegoRide and Brachio Bench. This is pretty big and fast roller coasters. Watch out they can be really sweep off your feet.
Not all people can ride on a real roller coaster so the same will be in virtual reality!

This game is like a time machine in our world.
But more safely! Dinosaurs were bigger and more dangerous than animals from our world. Now you can meet deadly creatures like T Rex or Spinosaurus with no harm to your life. Survive this adventure in one of the forgotten island. You can take this prehistoric world in your pocket and show friends almost everywhere.

Dinosaur types in game:
- Tyrannosaurus aka T Rex
- Triceratops
- Velociraptor aka Raptor
- Stegosaurus
- Brachiosaurus
- Parasaurolophus
- Pachycephalosaurus
- Spinosaurus
- Tropeognathus

KEY FEATURES:
- Amazing Jurassic era world environment (Island, Cave, Tunnel)
- Meet your favorite dinosaurs like T Rex
- Easy control, simply look on the ground to go or use a mobile joystick
- Many species of dinosaur, from hunter carnivores to herbivore
- Prehistoric virtual reality (VR) simulator for your phone

REQUIREMENTS & NOTES:
To use Virtual Reality you need Cardboard or VR-BOX for the device.
For better experience use headphones.
VR mode is only enabled for iPhone 5 / 5S / 5C series, iPhone 6 and 6 Plus series and iPhone 6s and 6s Plus series and higher.
On iPhone 4S and all iPad, you have 3D mode ONLY!
Do not wait any longer. T Rex and many others dinos waiting for YOU!
